titles.title: To amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to facilitate the placement of foster children in permanent kinship care arrangements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 11/8/1993--Introduced. Amends part E (Foster Care and Adoption Assistance) of title IV of the Social Security Act to give States the option of deeming as adoption the placement of a child who was under State supervised foster care with a blood relative given legal custody of the child.
